Hey slark,

I just uploaded a new version of HyperNEAT which includes the B=
oard library and updates to the manual.  You can find it in the same locati=
on as the old one on the eplex site.

Here's some commands that should buil=
d HyperNEAT on ubuntu:

sudo apt-get install cmake cmake-qt-gui libwxgtk2.8=
-dev libboost-dev libopenmpi-dev

unzip HyperNEAT_v3_0.zip

cd JGTL/build/
=
mkdir release
cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory ent=
ries point to valid locations)
make
cd ../../../

cd zlib/build/
mkdir rele=
ase
cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries point=
 to valid locations)
make
cd ../../../


cd tinyxmldll/build/
mkdir release=

cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries point to=
 valid locations)
make
cd ../../../

cd Board/build/
mkdir release
cd relea=
se
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries point to valid lo=
cations)
make
cd ../../../

cd HyperNEAT_03_29_10/HyperNEAT/build/
mkdir re=
lease
cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries poi=
nt to valid locations)
make

Under Windows, the directions are similar once=
 you have all the dependencies:

(Download and install dependencies cmake w=
xwidgets boost openmpi)

unzip HyperNEAT_v3_0.zip

cd JGTL/build/
mkdir rel=
ease
cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries poin=
t to valid locations)
(Open Visual Studio)
(Build the library)
cd ../../../=


cd zlib/build/
mkdir release
cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that =
the directory entries point to valid locations)
(Open Visual Studio)
(Build=
 the library)
cd ../../../


cd tinyxmldll/build/
mkdir release
cd release
=
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries point to valid locat=
ions)
(Open Visual Studio)
(Build the library)
cd ../../../

cd Board/build=
/
mkdir release
cd release
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory e=
ntries point to valid locations)
(Open Visual Studio)
(Build the library)
c=
d ../../../

cd HyperNEAT_03_29_10/HyperNEAT/build/
mkdir release
cd releas=
e
cmake-gui ../../
(Make sure that the directory entries point to valid loc=
ations)
(Open Visual Studio)
(Build the library)
